website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for novice to intermediate bowlers, or those who bowl for recreation – though more competitive bowlers may not be impressed with its durability or performance.
pros: A good-looking ball from one of the top names in the industry
Earns praise for being easy to control
Good choice for entry-and mid-level bowlers
Makes a great spare ball or straight ball
Comes in a wide array of sizes and colors
cons: A few bowlers report cracks after bowling several games
Not ideal for anyone who prefers a ball that produces a hard hook

customer_reviews.title: New to Bowling ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well pleased with this ball. Local bowling alley shop measured my hand and drilled finger holes for $25.00. Fits great. I am 67 and never bowled much before. Have rolled several games in the last two months and am enjoying the fun and relaxation. I only roll straight balls. Am not interested in even learning to curve and hook. Rolling 150 to 170 will be good enough for me. I have no doubt the ball could do much better than that, but it will probably have to find a different owner to do so.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES this new ball.  Says it works perfectly to bring in the spares he needs to make his scores sing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new Bruswick TZone Indigo Swirl Bowling Ball. For Christmas, my son and I bought him another new bowling ball that would give him the "hook" that bowlers want / need to "bring it in!" That ball worked great. But...now he needed a ball that he could throw that would hang straight down the lane so that he could pick up those all important spares. This ball is that second ball - that ball that brings in those spares! He loves it! He's happy ergo I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Kolk

customer_reviews.title: A good beginner ball for someone who likes to bowl
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves this ball. We had it drilled for 25 bucks at a bowling alley to fit her perfectly. A good beginner ball for someone who likes to bowl, but doesn't want to spend tons of money on the sport. Price is cheaper than in bowling alley pro shops, but the drilling fee to get it fit to your fingers might make it the same price as buying it in the shop, as they usually don't charge you for that if you buy it from them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this ball. Having never purchased a ball online before, I was hesitant, but I can say it is beautiful and handles very well. I love the appearance and get compliments on it all the time! If you throw a fairly straight ball with little to no curve this is the ball for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for my son
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for my autistic son who loves to bowl. He picked out the color and we got it on sale. It's a beautiful color and he is in love with this ball and won't use any other ball. His game has improved with each use. It cost more to customize drill and engrave than the ball. And I saw a similar used ball for upwards of $100. It's a great buy. I hope I can find me one just as good at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Di Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just had the ball drilled this weekend. This is my first spare ball, but I have been having a lot of trouble picking the 10 pin with my strike ball(16lb). Rolled 2 games right after drilling and strictly went after the 10 pin. Once I found the mark that was comfortable for me I was all over it! I have a high rev rate so if I were to throw this as a strike ball I can get it to curve a little, but for the most part this ball goes very straight. I picked this up in 14lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This ball sparkles
customer_reviews.text: This ball is pretty and sparkles. The first ball I threw with it was a strike. My first three games were 141, 173, and 182 the best I've bowled since I started league bowling in September. It's a great ball for me. I throw very little hook so it's perfect for me. I would order this ball again when I need another one and the price is super affordable. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Turns Heads!
customer_reviews.text: This ball made an excellent gift, and the design turned quite a few heads at my local bowling alley. Everyone knows that it's not your standard ball, and the throw on this one is quite great for the bowling style it is being used for. The real challenge was finding a place to do the hole drilling, but after that, I couldn't be more satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: The section between the drilled finger holes broke off and rendered the ball useless. Junk
customer_reviews.text: My ball BROKE! The section between the drilled finger holes broke off and rendered the ball useless. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: S Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Exact ball I needed.
customer_reviews.text: House shot/League bowler. 2 finger style, but more of a tweener than a cranker. But i got this to use as a spare ball or super dry lanes and it's perfect for that need. It goes long and really doesn't move until it gets through the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever owned my own ball. It is great to have one that fits me. I am still not the greatest bowler but I enjoy it and I don't come home hurting because the ball was too heavy or finger holes didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPendragon

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BALL!!
customer_reviews.text: The poor reviews made me a little nervous, but I’m happy to say it’s perfect!! I purchased the Caribbean blue one. It arrived in great condition, I’ve used it for 5 games and I’ve bowled my best scores! This ball literally GLOWS under black lights! (Best looking ball in the alley.) I have nothing negative to say about this ball!
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn E

customer_reviews.title: Grrst quality for a starter bowler.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bowling ball. It's my first and has improved my game immensely. Being a new bowler was bowling just around the 100's. Now my second time using it I bowled a 144/143/135/189. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this ball and I am planning on ordering a 10lb of the same ball. My only concern is it has developed a couple of nicks after less than one month of use. I think given it is a plastic ball that is probably normal no matter who makes the ball. I also think it would probably not chip as much with a heavier ball. My husband has the 12 pound in this ball and he has had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanettie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Cracked on my 4th game 😐 This was a replacement ball. The first ball I got 6 games out of. In the market for a 3rd ball. Definitely won't be a Brunswick
customer_reviews.author: Lani Hetz- Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a spare ball
customer_reviews.text: It will only hook if you throw it extremely slow or put lots of revs on it
customer_reviews.author: Kerry and Andrea Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: Slides a little but further down the lane then I would like, but that's just because of the plastic cover. A little heavier then I thought (15 lbs). If I have to do it again I'd go a little lower. Good pin action though and it looks cool rolling down the lane :) Excellent spare ball!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Gift Ideas
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my man, we both enjoy bowling. He enjoys it more now. He does not have to worry what germs may be on a bowling ball at the alley, had it drilled to fit his hand and this improved his bowling score. Great gift for man or women, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves it! Claims having his own ball with the holes drilled to fit him has improved his game. ;-) For the price it beats using the bowling alley balls even if you only bowl a few times a year.
customer_reviews.author: lady arch

customer_reviews.title: Not the high quality I expected from Brunswick
customer_reviews.text: I loved this ball when I got it. Paid $45 to have the holes drilled in it. Used it 4 separate times (12 games total) and it’s done. It’s breaking apart around the finger holes and I have HUGE cracks running over the entire ball. Too late to return through Amazon. I have emailed Brunswick, so we’ll see how much they want to stand behind their products. Having the exact same issue with another Brunswick ball we purchased through here less than a year ago as well. I really thought a company that’s been around as long as them would make a higher quality product. Really hope they make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this ball. Had holes drilled and my name put on it at a local bowler shop. Got the 8 pound during to back problems and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kathryn Evans

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Plastic spare ball that dies exactly what it’s supposed to do. 10 pin killer. Purchased a 13lb ball for my wife (it’s pink) and she is nicknamed “dead shot” because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ball I’m an occasional bowler with large hands and was done with trying to find a house ball I could use. My game has improved and now have very consistent game
customer_reviews.author: Rktmn

customer_reviews.title: Great Warehouse Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, at an amazing price. I purchased this from amazon warehouse for under $25. I took a chance, hoping it wasn't drilled yet & received a ball in perfect condition, just a little damage to the outside box.
customer_reviews.author: acustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a straight spare ball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a well-worn spare ball that had begun cracking (different brand). So far it is meeting expectations. Definitely goes straight, even with some spin on it. Good for spare shooting...
customer_reviews.author: Optimist

customer_reviews.title: Ball has no finish as it should.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the ball arrived unfinished. its semi dull and very slippery. it feels like they put slip agent on it and did not burn it the stuff into the ball. i am a league player (helicopter player) and has ball spinner and got other 5 balls. i never received a ball with such unfinished finish,its very strange. i guess i will just toss some polish on it,on the spinner to make it look as it should. but please check your bowling balls before you send them.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Good beginning ball for my son
customer_reviews.text: Good beginning ball for my son. Not a hooking ball, just a straight "house type" ball but very nice looking and good feel. Drilled holes myself. Good spare ball once you step up to a hooking style ball.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Even an 8-lb. ball is too heavy for me so I ordered this 6-lb. and had it drilled at our local bowling alley. I like it a lot and like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: worship2AbbaFather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner's ball
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my 17 year old son who is new to bowling. The ball is perfect for him. We will most likely be buying a couple more balls for other family members. I was impressed with how quickly we received the ball!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: No holes!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great ball and a great price but it doesn't have finger holes you need to get it drilled on your own. So it will cost you an extra $40.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner ball. Just bought the wife one to start her bowling hobby. Used it for 4 games and it doesn't have a scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Grose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bowling Ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a while ago. Wanted to give credit where credit is due. It was a GREAT purchase. The Pro Shop was charging over $100. You can feel confident in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lets Talk

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ball
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Kicking my butt at the alley
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product was easy to get drilled and results are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Me too the price was perfect and we go every weekend so it is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 13 birthday the pictures do not give this ball any justice ..... It has so many sparkles it really does light up when we go comic bowling and she loves it ..... Me too the price was perfect and we go every weekend so it is getting well used
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This one I ordered for my 9 year old daughter, and she loves it. The name of it says enough, and with my daughter being a beginner, the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done......
customer_reviews.text: This ball comes in handy when going for the ten pin. It travels straight, and looks great on the lanes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawayne Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Awsome color plus the expected performance!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome color when going down the lane, with the T-Zone performance (I use it as a spare ball) one expects from Brunswick.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE GUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: Ask for professional advice before you buy a nice colored ball from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not the right ball for me. Ask for professional advice before you buy a nice colored ball from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C Nash

customer_reviews.title: Straight ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball does what I want, it goes straight where you throw it. Very little curve if any.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my 14 yr old daughter as her straight ball for spares as she is bowling on her high school bowling team. The ball itself had better color quality than the picture on Amazon. We were surprised about the sparkles. She used it in practice today and was able to be more consistent picking up spares.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good spare ball.  Pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this pretty bowling ball. Colors are vibrant. Works great for the ten pin.
customer_reviews.author: sasdel

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and slightly disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty ball, just disappointed its supposed to be a brand new ball and it came with a scratch/gouge. Had to have been sent like this too because the boxes it came in are in perfectly good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn S

customer_reviews.title: Not predrilled/not enough scarlet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but not enough scarlet color for me. Also, not predrilled (I asked and never got a response) and 9lbs was too heavy for me. Sorry but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: TAY MADDEN

customer_reviews.title: I bought ball one pound lighter than my regular ball and this works out great. Am now making those terrible ten pin leaves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this plastic ball almost exclusively to use for ten pin because it doesn't break. I bought ball one pound lighter than my regular ball and this works out great. Am now making those terrible ten pin leaves. Tried it for the 7 pin but stuck with my regular hooking ball for left side leaves. My average continues to increase as a result of hitting that darn 10 pin
customer_reviews.author: burton ramberger

customer_reviews.title: I'm over 50 and this is great!
customer_reviews.text: Used urethane in my younger days. Now that I am older, this ball is perfect! Having a blast learning to bowl again! My scores are constantly improving!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mallinson

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a five star rating based on the reaction of the recipient Since it was not a purchase for personal use I cannot comment further other than to say it is very attractive..
customer_reviews.author: June Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spare ball, or for use on very dry lane conditions
customer_reviews.author: Lar VH

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners or if you don't bowl fast
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as a spare ball for a very short period. Cracked after only a few days. Probably not a good choice if you bowl 18+ MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Small

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price and a good value
customer_reviews.text: Well made an affordable bowling ball. 10 games bowled so far with no issues. Definitely easier to throw the 12-pounder than my old 16 pound ball so this is a great addition to my game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his new bowling ball
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bowling ball for my grandson, who's a sophomore in high school and on the school bowling team. He loves his new bowling ball and it has his initials. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley walker

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old and he loves it. The ball has to be taken to a pro shop and drilled for your kids hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Not only fun but therapeutic as well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who is autistic and it's very hard to get him active in anything. Since I got him this ball for xmas and had it custom drilled and engraved with the nickname (that he gave himself) I can't keep him away from the lanes. Not only fun but therapeutic as well. Best purchase I've ever made. Plus it's really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: A new level!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this ball should be in a class of it's own and after a 14 year lay off I'm sure my new T friend will enable me back to greatness. I enjoy and recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: pete macri

customer_reviews.title: Talk to your pro shop first.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been cheaper to buy from the pro shop because it costs more to have it drilled when you don't buy their package.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This Brunswich Tzone Deep Space bowling. ball made a great gift for my son. The color was great and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Start
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner ball but I started wishing fairly quickly I got a heavier one. The lighter ones bounce a lot but nothing that you can't watch out for.
customer_reviews.author: Salsa SharkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great ball 💯
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Had holes drilled. Does exactly what i want it to do. Went with 15 lb. love it.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This a good price for the bowling ball, same one will cost you double the price at a bowling alley. Looks great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fetko

customer_reviews.title: Great spare always with me
customer_reviews.text: It’s a spare goes straight will not curve its plastic
customer_reviews.author: Jeef

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. Will be buying more balls in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry H

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: As good as expected, packaging could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: R Nalley

customer_reviews.title: Fun ball that works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for mt first one. Have had no problems with it and have used it for a few months now. I really like the looks of it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a family member and it was very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Was awesome till had it drilled
customer_reviews.text: Make sure person drilling knows what they are doing. Great Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fun color!
customer_reviews.text: Fun ball! Lots of compliments from friends & decent price!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! Use it as my clean up ball. Love the design on the ball
customer_reviews.author: nickm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & very user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I picked such a perfect item 1st item around. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RMIdiver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson, Zach, picked out this ball & he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: GranJan47

customer_reviews.title: Great Straight Throw ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is perfect for my straight throw. It was easily holed at the local bowling alley and works great. I don't roll the ball much, is just slides down the lane pretty straight, and this ball adapts to that kind of throw perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Balls are great had them drilled and we went bowling this morning and made a huge difference for the better! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennysmith8766

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for a close family friend as a birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a close family friend as a birthday gift took him to the local bowling alley and had the holes custom drilled and fitted. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Magnumforce

customer_reviews.title: Bowling Ball & Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bowling ball & bag was a gift for my niece. She loves it. Very helpful with her having her own ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: The ball is well loved by a bowler who recently retook up the game
customer_reviews.text: It is getting a lot of use. The ball is well loved by a bowler who recently retook up the game.
customer_reviews.author: L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife has actually said she likes going bowling with me. Thank you pinky goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowling!
customer_reviews.text: Really great beginners ball! Make sure you have an expert to drill your custom holes for you. Beautiful finish. The marbleing looks really cool as you send it down the lane. You can see if you are putting a good spin on it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lothchomphou

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied but do your research for best deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice buy, however if you have a shop in your town it may be cheaper to just buy one from them since you will have to go there and pay to have holes drilled.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bowling ball
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bowling ball. I have had plenty of fun using my bowling ball, and I am slowly getting better, when I have the money to practice.
customer_reviews.author: David Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight for him he is 5 years old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. Perfect weight for him he is 5 years old. Well made and a good starter ball Shipped on time and have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I had it drilled at the local alley and it works and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Herman L. Ligon

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for wife while she was STARTING to bowl. It is good for that purpose. The ball cracked in less than 6 months and the pro at the local bowling alley said that it was more the heat from it sitting in the trunk than a ball defect. There is NO curve to this ball at all! It is a straight ball, hence perfect for a starter ball!
customer_reviews.author: adamlov7

customer_reviews.title: Cracked ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball was purchased in the six pound size. The ball looked great. Had it drilled and my lady friend started using. After five uses the ball cracked across the finger holes and spread across the ball.
customer_reviews.author: TWL

customer_reviews.title: Great ball... awesome colors!
customer_reviews.text: Only a value if you have an inexpensive shop that will drill it at the right price. Otherwise it’s probably best to just purchase retail as many shops give discounts on drilling when Balls are purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew got this as his first practice ball. He loves it, and even got strikes after having fingertip drilling on this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mishy

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for straight bowlers.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for straight bowlers. Basic ball for people just starting .
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. E.

customer_reviews.title: It chipped
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had this ball for 3 months and it chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Was a Christmas present for my 12 year old, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Scarpelli

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball! This is my first ball I’m buying, so we’ll see how log it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: FOR PICKING UP SPARES
customer_reviews.text: Noticed AFTER ordering this ball is weighted to pick up spares. My son throws with a curve and it was not right ball for him. Had to pay shipping fees to return. So took about a 20 dollar loss
customer_reviews.author: melissa c kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Bowling g call for a youth us perfect arrived on time - great product
customer_reviews.text: Great Ball - perfect for a young boy - colors are true it’s made well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bowling ball rolls perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the sparkle of the bowling ball. I use the bowling ball for the bowling league I joined,And I haven’t bowled in years and I’m making great scores with this new bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Great Feel, Handles very well
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a real gem. Handles well-exactly what we were hoping for. May purchase another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: BRWARBORMI

customer_reviews.title: My oldest son loved opening this on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son loved opening this on Christmas morning! Green is his favorite color. Great product, especially for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for
customer_reviews.text: This ball was purchased for my son. He is new to bowling. The ball is great! We had it drilled to fit his grip. He has bowled with it several time and really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's ball.
customer_reviews.text: This ball does NOT come with holes pre-drilled. Holes will be required to be custom drilled to your size. This is a great beginner's bowling ball, cheap, and delivered quick.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First ever bowling ball. Beautiful colors, works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.author: EQuinnB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, looks beautiful. Did not realize it would glow under blacklight#
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Ball Sent TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 lb ball but received a 13 lb ball. The exchange process was simple, and a new ball was sent right away; however, I received another 13 lb ball. Now I'm just annoyed and frustrated. I'm returning this and ordering elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Zeiber-Linfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Ball looked exactly as it did online. Was smooth, with no defects. My dad loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bowling ball
customer_reviews.text: Brought this ball for my wife she loves it good bowling!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

product_meta.title: Brunswick Tzone Deep Space Bowling Ball
product_meta.description: Blast the competition with the Brunswick TZone Arctic Blast. This fun plastic/spare ball not only looks good on the lanes but is perfect for beginners, straight bowlers, or pros looking for a spare ball.
